aws::graph::propositions: # Accident Information and Pilot Details
The defining event was loss of control on ground during landing-landing roll.
The pilot held a Commercial certificate.
The pilot was a 42-year-old female.
The pilot had a Single-engine land airplane rating.
The pilot occupied the front seat.
The pilot had no other aircraft ratings.
The pilot had an Airplane instrument rating.
The pilot had no instructor ratings.
The pilot had a Class 2 medical certification with waivers/limitations.
The pilot's last Federal Aviation Administration medical exam was on December 28, 2012.
The pilot was not an occupational pilot.
The pilot had 574 total flight hours in all aircraft.
The pilot had 55 flight hours in this make and model of aircraft.
A second pilot was present during the incident.
No toxicology was performed on the pilot.
The co-pilot held a Commercial certificate.
The co-pilot was a 66-year-old male.
The co-pilot had Single-engine land and Single-engine sea airplane ratings.
The co-pilot occupied the rear seat.
The co-pilot had no other aircraft ratings.
The co-pilot had an Airplane instrument rating.
The co-pilot had no instructor ratings.
The co-pilot had a Class 2 medical certification with waivers/limitations.
The co-pilot's last Federal Aviation Administration medical exam was on April 12, 2013.
The co-pilot's last flight review or equivalent was on April 15, 2012.
The co-pilot had an estimated 12,589 total flight hours in all aircraft.
The co-pilot had an estimated 9,578 flight hours in this make and model of aircraft.
No toxicology was performed on the co-pilot.

text:
# Factual Information

## History of Flight
| Landing-landing roll | Loss of control on ground (Defining event) |

## Pilot Information
| Certificate: | Commercial |
| Age: | 42,Female |
| Airplane Rating(s): | Single-engine land |
| Seat Occupied: | Front |
| Other Aircraft Rating(s): | None |
| Restraint Used: |  |
| Instrument Rating(s): | Airplane |
| Second Pilot Present: | Yes |
| Instructor Rating(s): | None |
| Toxicology Performed: | No |
| Medical Certification: | Class 2 With waivers/limitations |
| Last FAA Medical Exam: | December 28, 2012 |
| Occupational Pilot: | No |
| Last Flight Review or Equivalent: |  |
| Flight Time: | 574 hours (Total, all aircraft), 55 hours (Total, this make and model) |

## Co-pilot Information
| Certificate: | Commercial |
| Age: | 66,Male |
| Airplane Rating(s): | Single-engine land; Single-engine sea |
| Seat Occupied: | Rear |
| Other Aircraft Rating(s): | None |
| Restraint Used: |  |
| Instrument Rating(s): | Airplane |
| Second Pilot Present: | Yes |
| Instructor Rating(s): | None |
| Toxicology Performed: | No |
| Medical Certification: | Class 2 With waivers/limitations |
| Last FAA Medical Exam: | April 12, 2013 |

| Last Flight Review or Equivalent: | April 15, 2012 |
| Flight Time: | (Estimated) 12589 hours (Total, all aircraft), 9578 hours (Total, this make and model) |
